column6: Has everyone read the different plans?
Looks like plan 2 is the obvious choice
It's overbudget though
yup
I like plan 2 also
And apparently the budget is tight
Lets just go with plan 2 and raise taxes a bit :)
It is a little over budget but not by a large percentage.
Also people will be happier because of the fresh air.
Plan 2 is cheaper than 3 or 4
Only plan 1 is within budget but not a clean option
and half the dirty coal
$48 million is also a lot for a tax
anything else we can add?
I would put that it's also overbudget, not just that it costs more than plan 1
also wind could harm bird habitats
The only thing now would be the bird population that is emphasized. How would it affect tourism?
Would it be better to halve the wind power and put it into hydro, at the increased cost?
sell it as a place tourist cann come and look at wonderful clean energy wind farms
No, the cost must be kept as low as possible
I'm sure there is a high altitude and more barren area we could allocate for the turbines
